H0.text: What is the Japanese art of paper-folding called. Kamizuki

H1.text: What is the Japanese art of paper-folding called. Origata

H2.text: What is the Japanese art of paper-folding called. Kirikami

H3.text: What is the Japanese art of paper-folding called. 折紙

A4.text: Origami (折り紙) is the Japanese art of paper folding.

A5.text: The term 'origata' is one of the old terms for origami.

A6.text: The paper folded vertically is called 'tategami' (竪紙), while the paper folded horizontally is called 'origami', and origami has a lower status than tategami.
